cards.question: <{start-terminal}>How do you list files in a directory on Linux?</{end-terminal}>

<{start-h1}>Networking Commands<{end-h1}>

List three common Linux networking commands.

<{start-h1}>Steps for Adding a Route<{end-h1}>

What are the steps to add a route in Linux?
cards.answer:
<{numbered-item}>Use 'ip route add' to add the route<{end-numbered-item}>
<{numbered-item}>Verify the route using 'ip route show'<{end-numbered-item}>

cards.question: Complete the following table of IP address classes.
<{start-terminal}>What command do you use to display the current directory?<{end-terminal}>

<{start-terminal}>How many network interfaces are shown in the following output?

1: lo: <LOOPBACK,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 65536
2: eth0: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP> mtu 1500
3: wlan0: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST> mtu 1500
<{end-terminal}>
